title: Supreme Cannabis Turnaround With CEO Beena Goldenberg
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Supreme Cannabis is a promising turnaround story out of Canada, thanks in large part to its CEO, Beena Goldenberg. Delivering sustainable profitability, driving revenues and the developing Canadian retail picture. Being a role model for women executives and thoughts on the global cannabis landscape. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
